meanings.definition: To agree or consent to a demand or request.
meanings.sent1: She acceded to their request for help.
meanings.sent2: The board finally acceded to the proposal after much discussion.
meanings.sent3: The cat acceded to the dog's demand for the sunny spot by the window.
meanings.sent4: After hours of negotiation, they acceded to the terms of the contract.
meanings.sent5: He acceded to her wishes and decided to join her on the adventure.

meanings.definition: To enter upon an office or position.
meanings.sent1: He acceded to the role of team captain with pride.
meanings.sent2: The new CEO will accede to the position next month.
meanings.sent3: The puppy acceded to the title of chief nap-taker in the house.
meanings.sent4: She acceded to the throne with grace and dignity.
meanings.sent5: After years of hard work, he finally acceded to the prestigious position.

meanings.definition: To become a party to an agreement or treaty.
meanings.sent1: The country acceded to the trade agreement to boost its economy.
meanings.sent2: Both parties acceded to the terms of the peace treaty.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel acceded to the birds' treaty of sharing the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: She acceded to the alliance, hoping for mutual benefits.
meanings.sent5: The company acceded to the international agreement for environmental protection.
